EGX Rezzed

12-14 March 2015, London

26 feb. 2015

We are going to the EGX Rezzed (12-14 March, 2015) in London!

The game will be (almost-)fully playable. Come and try to get the best score!


As of today, Steredenn is also available on pre-order for Steam (PC/Mac/Linux). As soon as the beta is ready, we will give an access to all the buyers. What’s best? The game is also on sale for a limited time and only for the pre-orders.

Pre-ordering the game is the best way to support us! :)

Thanks.

26 february. 2015
By Pixelnest Studio

Steam Greenlight

help us getting greenlit!

15 jan. 2015

Happy new year!

Let’s start with a great new for Pixelnest: Steredenn has been submitted on Steam Greenlight!

Our main focus is still the Xbox One, but we don’t want to forget PC players.

If you like Steredenn — we sure hope so —, help us getting greenlit!

Thanks for your support. :)

15 january. 2015
By Pixelnest Studio

Shows and... Xbox One

a small surprise

04 dec. 2014

Hey folks,

Last week, Damien and I were at the EIGD and TGS.

We made a big announcement during our Pitch My Game presentation: Steredenn is coming on the Xbox One! \o/

(You can find our presentation here.)

We talked with a lot of awesome people during the week-end. We also had a demo of Steredenn which was played by hundreds of gamers.

We got tons of feedback. We cannot thank you enough for your support, your time and the love you showed for Steredenn. :)

It’s going to be awesome.


A special mention to a few games we (re-)discovered during the week:

  • NeuroVoider, a beautiful upcoming twin-stick shooter;
  • Lavapools, a deadly hardcore-arcade-dodge-surviveifyoucan game (currently on sale);
  • Kaaarot, a fun multiplayers smasher;
  • And the splendid Ilios we already saw during the Stunfest 2014.
4 december. 2014
By Matthieu Oger

Enjoy.
